responsibilities: Lead the design and development of generative AI models for 3D content creation.
Work with platforms like Blender, Unity, and Unreal Engine to integrate AI-driven solutions.
Build pipelines for realistic textures, materials, and animation generation.
Collaborate with cross-functional teams including designers, artists, and game developers to ensure seamless implementation of AI capabilities.
Drive innovation in generative AI technologies to optimize workflow and improve gaming experiences.
Mentor junior engineers and foster a culture of technical excellence.
category: Prompt Engineering and Large Language Models (LLMs)
activity: Fine-tuning and customization of language models
analysis: The job responsibilities focus on the design and development of generative AI models for 3D content creation, integration with platforms like Blender, Unity, and Unreal Engine, and collaboration with cross-functional teams. The activity of fine-tuning and customization of language models is specific to language models and does not directly relate to 3D content creation or the platforms mentioned. Therefore, this activity is not relevant to the job responsibilities.
